description: A waxed-linen undershirt in bone-white with sweat-darkened patches

core:description.text: An undershirt of waxed linen, originally bone-white but now darkened at the collar and underarms by the salt of honest labor. The waxing keeps the worst of the damp out, though it gives the fabric a faintly waxy sheen. Serviceable construction, meant for work rather than appearance.
